name: Educational Game For Kids (itch)
description:
VD games is here to give you and entire family educational entertainment that can intensify alert thinking of the child’s developing mind and stir exciting participation by all ages.   

You can have fun at our various mind-stimulating games.   Learn different shapes and colors, find the right match with captivating beautiful animal,identify sizes and arrange them , stimulate your memory recall with enchanting pictures, experience counting numbers more interestingly , fascinate your brains with mystifying images and fix them , and trigger an exciting part of your logic thinking with patterns (pattern game).
